rows.label: qst103301_msg001
rows.name: おぼえてますか？(仮)

rows.label: qst103301_msg002
rows.name: 弟たちにこれ届けて(仮)

rows.label: qst103301_msg101
rows.name: 届けてくれた？(仮)

rows.label: qst103301_msg0001
rows.name: What do you want? ...Hmm? Hang on...

rows.label: qst103301_msg0002
rows.name: You lot look awfully familiar.

rows.label: qst103301_msg0003
rows.name: Oh, that's it! Now I remember!

rows.label: qst103301_msg0004
rows.name:
The town square in Torigo? The
Driver recruitment? I'm Jac! You
were there when I got recruited!

rows.label: qst103301_msg0005
rows.name: Do we remember him?

rows.label: qst103301_msg0006
rows.name: Of course!

rows.label: qst103301_msg0007
rows.name: Nope

rows.label: qst103301_msg0021
rows.name:
Oh, brilliant! It's
nice to be remembered.

rows.label: qst103301_msg0041
rows.name: Oh, really? Well I remember you.

rows.label: qst103301_msg0042
rows.name:
Everything about the moment I
resonated with that Core Crystal
is etched into my memory.

rows.label: qst103301_msg0043
rows.name:
Including the faces of
everyone who was watching!

rows.label: qst103301_msg0101
rows.name:
After that, they brought me here to
Alba Margen for basic training...

rows.label: qst103301_msg0102
rows.name:
And now I finally made
it! I'm an official Driver
of the Imperial Army!

rows.label: qst103301_msg0103
rows.name:
My position in the army lets me
send back money to my brothers
and sister, which is nice.

rows.label: qst103301_msg0104
rows.name:
I'm glad they're getting support now,
but I can't help feeling bad for leaving.
First Ma and Da, and now me...

rows.label: qst103301_msg0105
rows.name:
Our parents weren't really fans of the
Superbian army. I wonder if they'd be
disappointed if they could see me now.

rows.label: qst103301_msg0106
rows.name:
Ah well. No use worrying
over spilled milk.

rows.label: qst103301_msg0107
rows.name: Anyway, I've got other problems.

rows.label: qst103301_msg0108
rows.name:
I want to send some Superbian sweets
and toys to my family back home. I bet
they'd get a real kick out of them.

rows.label: qst103301_msg0109
rows.name:
But as a new recruit I don't get
much time off, and getting back to
Torigo isn't really on the cards.

rows.label: qst103301_msg0110
rows.name:
I already bought the sweets, but at
this rate they'll go off before I can
give them to my brothers and sister.

rows.label: qst103301_msg0111
rows.name: You'll help me out? Thank you so much!

rows.label: qst103301_msg0112
rows.name:
I'll run and fetch the
stuff right away!

rows.label: qst103301_msg0113
rows.name:
Oof, it's a little heavy. Guess
I went a bit overboard... Thank
you for agreeing to this!

rows.label: qst103301_msg0114
rows.name:
You'll find my siblings in the
Galad Residential Zone in Torigo.

rows.label: qst103301_msg0115
rows.name:
Their names are Neel, Zelan and
Morike! Don't get it wrong, yeah?

rows.label: qst103301_msg0117
rows.name:
I just wish I could have
given my ma a taste of that
Sky-Jewel Tarte too...

rows.label: qst103301_msg0118
rows.name:
There's nothing too breakable in
there, but if you could deliver
it ASAP I'd be really grateful!
